name: Senses
description:
Senses

The game Senses is all about a little guy dropped in a weird world. 
He desperately tries to escape room after room, solving riddle after riddle to get his life, specifically bodily senses, back in order. 

That is, after initial confusion, he realizes that some of his senses are just "not there", but by solving riddles and unlocking secret doors he hopes to regain each and every single sense.

Controls

Click to walk. Click again if close by to interact. If nothing happens you cant interact with that object. Or you are too far away. Or its buggy :D

Credits

Felix Tschernay 
Juri Larch 
Michael Steurer
